text: The Fajr 3 is a Iranian missile and it is a modification of the North Korean M 1985.Johnson, David E., Hard Fighting: Israel in Lebanon and Gaza. Santa Monica, CA: RAND Corporation, 2011. p. 51. https://www.rand.org/pubs/monographs/MG1085.html . Also available in print form. It was created in the 1990s and has been given to Hizbullah and Hamas' military wing, the Izz ad-Din al-Qassam Brigades. ==References== Category:Rockets Category:Missiles Category:Iran Category:Hamas
title: Fajr 3
